mapper.update:
update tag_info
tag_code = #{tagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag_name = #{tagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tag_use_num = #{tagUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tag_info set tag_code = #{tagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_name = #{tagName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_use_num = #{tagUseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tag_type_code = #{tagTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag_type_name = #{tagTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update.foreach: update tag_info set tag_use_num = tag_use_num + #{item.changeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} where tag_code = #{item.tagCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
